00016 using namespace std;
00019 class Expr {
00020 protected:
00021     // extra tables to be joined
00022     Split extraTables;
00023 public:
00024     // default expression is true
00025     virtual string asString() const { return "True"; }
00026 
00027 
00028     Split getExtraTables() const { 
00029         return extraTables;
00030     }
00031     virtual ~Expr() {}
00032 };
00034 class RawExpr : public Expr {
00035     string expr;
00036 public:
00037     RawExpr(string e) : expr(e) {}
00038     virtual string asString() const { return expr; }
00039 };
00041 class Connective : public Expr {
00042 private:
00043     string op;
00044 protected:
00045     const Expr &e1, &e2;
00046     
00047     Connective(string o, const Expr & e1_, const Expr & e2_)
00048         : op(o), e1(e1_), e2(e2_) { }
00049     
00050 public:        
00051     virtual ~Connective() {}
00052     
00053     virtual string asString() const {
00054         string res = "(" + e1.asString() + ") " + op 
00055             + " (" + e2.asString() + ")";
00056         return res;
00057     }
00058 };  
00060 class And : public Connective {
00061 public:
00062     And(const Expr & e1_, const Expr & e2_) : Connective("and", e1_, e2_) {}
00063     virtual string asString() const {     
00064         if (e1.asString() == "True")
00065             return e2.asString();
00066         else if (e2.asString() == "True")
00067             return e1.asString();
00068         else
00069             return Connective::asString();
00070     }
00071 };
00073 class Or : public Connective {
00074 public:
00075     Or(const Expr & e1_, const Expr & e2_) 
00076         : Connective("or", e1_, e2_) {}
00077     virtual string asString() const {
00078         if (e1.asString() == "True")
00079             return "True";
00080         else if (e2.asString() == "True")
00081             return "True";
00082         else
00083             return Connective::asString();
00084     }
00085 };
00087 class Not : public Expr {
00088 private:
00089     const Expr & exp;
00090 public:
00091     Not(const Expr & _exp) : exp(_exp) {}
00092     virtual string asString() const {    
00093         return "not ("+exp.asString()+")";
00094     }
00095         
00096 };
00098 class Oper : public Expr {
00099 protected:
00100     const FieldType & field;
00101     string op;
00102     string data;
00103     bool escape;
00104     
00105     Oper(const FieldType & fld, const string& o, const string& d) 
00106         : field(fld), op(o), data(d), escape(true) {
00107         extraTables.push_back(fld.table());
00108     }
00109     Oper(const FieldType & fld, const string& o, const FieldType &f2) 
00110         : field(fld), op(o), data(f2.fullName()), escape(false) {
00111         extraTables.push_back(fld.table());
00112     }
00113 
00114 public:
00115     virtual string asString() const {
00116         string res;
00117         res += field.fullName() + " " + op + " " + (escape ? escapeSQL(data) : data);
00118         return res;
00119     }
00120 };
00122 class Eq : public Oper {
00123 public:
00124     Eq(const FieldType & fld, const string& d)
00125         : Oper(fld, "=", d) {}
00126     Eq(const FieldType & fld, const FieldType & f2)
00127         : Oper(fld, "=", f2) {}
00128 
00129 };
00131 class NotEq : public Oper {
00132 public:
00133     NotEq(const FieldType & fld, const string& d)
00134         : Oper(fld, "<>", d) {}
00135     NotEq(const FieldType & fld, const FieldType & f2)
00136         : Oper(fld, "<>", f2) {
00137     }
00138    
00139 };

00142 public:
00143     Gt(const FieldType & fld, const string& d)
00144         : Oper(fld, ">", d) {}
00145     Gt(const FieldType & fld, const FieldType& d)
00146         : Oper(fld, ">", d) {}
00147 
00148 };

00155         : Oper(fld, ">=", d) {}
00156 
00157 };

00166 };

00175 };
00177 class Like : public Oper {
00178 public:
00179     Like(const FieldType & fld, const string& d)
00180         : Oper(fld, "like", d) {}
00181 };
00182 class SelectQuery;
00184 class In : public Oper {
00185 public:
00186     In(const FieldType & fld, const string& set)
00187         : Oper(fld, "in", "("+set+")") {};
00188     In(const FieldType & fld, const SelectQuery& s);
00189     virtual string asString() const {
00190         return field.fullName() + " " + op + " " + data;
00191     }
00192     
00193 };
00194 And operator&&(const Expr& o1, const Expr& o2);
00195 Or operator||(const Expr& o1, const Expr& o2);
00196 template <class T>
00197 litesql::Eq operator==(const litesql::FieldType& fld, const T& o2) {
00198     return litesql::Eq(fld, litesql::toString(o2));
00199 }

00205 NotEq operator!=(const FieldType& fld, const FieldType& f2);
